name: Hindsight
long_description:
Hindsight's AI helps teams understand why they win or lose deals - and use that insight to win more.

Our platform is used by teams like Ironclad, LaunchDarkly, and Klaviyo to build workflows on top of their GTM data.

1. Build battlecards, objection handling guides, and case studies that never go out of date
2. Create AI roleplays based on real conversations your sales team is having
3. Analyze 1000s of deals to create reports and alerts for your GTM, product, and strategy teams.
one_liner: Deal Intelligence and Sales Coaching Platform
